items.sentence: It took Tom a lot of time to find a parking space.
It took quite a while to sort out all our luggage.
The police detective didn\'t believe Tom\'s story.
The police found Tom\'s footprint in Mary\'s room.
Tom was glad that Mary was home with the children.
Tom was in the hospital for a few weeks last year.
Tom was kind enough to lend me the money I needed.
You still have a lot to learn about relationships.
I didn\'t know you were planning to leave at 2:30.
I didn\'t see Tom again till I got back to Boston.
